ItemConsumable.name: Chubb
ItemConsumable.description: This product promotes the rapid creation of fat deposits for a more full-figured woman, at no severe cost to the user's metabolism.

effectmutator.mutation: You apply the chubb and immediately feel it converting nourishment into fat deposits, bulking out your form. You're now MACRObody_weight_desc in build, your bust has grown into a lovely MACRObreast_size_desc pair, and a MACRObutt_size_desc rump sits on your shapelier thighs.
